title: Third Annual Night Flight Music Video Festival
description: A music video festival featuring various music videos at Nitehawk Cinema in Williamsburg.

title: Broadway Under the Stars
description: Enjoy intimate performances from Broadway shows at The Shops at Columbus Circle.
address: The Shops at Columbus Circle, UWS

title: Pancakes + Booze Art Show
description: A pop-up art show featuring works by local artists and all-you-can-eat pancakes at Brooklyn Monarch.

title: 11th Annual Greenwich Village Film Festival
description: A film festival showcasing various films at Quad Cinema in Greenwich Village.

title: 16th Annual DOC NYC Documentary Festival
description: A documentary festival featuring various films at multiple venues including IFC Center, SVA Theatre, and Village East by Angelika.
address: IFC Center, SVA Theatre, Village East by Angelika, and online

title: New York City Veterans Day Parade
description: The nation’s largest commemoration of service, marching up Fifth Avenue with over 20,000 participants.

title: Junk Journal Hang and Zine Trade
description: An event for zine fans to create junk journals at Purgatory in Bushwick.

title: Quiara Alegría Hudes with Lin-Manuel Miranda: The White Hot
description: A book launch event for Quiara Alegría Hudes' debut novel with a signing by Lin-Manuel Miranda at St. Ann and the Holy Trinity Church.
address: St. Ann and the Holy Trinity Church, Brooklyn Heights
cost: $10 admission, $31 ticket option includes a copy of the book.
